name: Are you human
description:
Major Update!

-Revamped tutorial

-15+ levels

-New abilities (Dash & WallJump)

-Secret level

-MacOs Build

The humans are long gone, replaced by technology.

In an attempt to create robots with human feeling, this new civilization is testing one thing... caring about others.

In these tests, if you hurt another robot, you will be hurt too.

This is a threat.
